question: Which country hosts the annual celebration "La Ceiba Carnival"?
explanation: The La Ceiba Carnival is an annual celebration in La Ceiba, Honduras held every third or fourth Saturday of May. The event is held in honour of Saint Isidore the Laborer, the patron saint of the city. The celebration starts at least one week before the main event, which is a big parade followed by an all-night party along Avenida San Isidro, La Ceiba's main thoroughfare.
